introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Videatly is a platform that allows you to create and manage your ideas, scripts, and workflows. The idea is to create a platform that allows you to improve your Video Production workflow and overall productivity by using AI features and tools built exactly for this purpose. Each feature is built to improve a specific part of the Video Production workflow. In the guides section you can find more information about each feature and how to use them.

core_features.title: Core Features
core_features.content: Videatly covers various parts of the Video Production workflow. You start by creating an idea, then from this idea you can create a script; each script is a timeline of video segments, you can add, remove, edit, and reorder them. From the script you can create a workflow to produce the video; workflows are like detailed group of data that you produced when creating the overall video.

ideas.title: Ideas
ideas.description: Ideas are the first step to create a video.
ideas.hint: To create a new idea click in the button Create Idea in the ideas section.

scripts.title: Scripts
scripts.description: Scripts are the second step to create a video.
scripts.hint: You can create a script by clicking on the idea you want to use and then clicking on the Create Script button.

production.title: Production
production.description: Production is the third step to create a video.
production.hint: To create a production click on the script you want to use and then clicking on the "Create Production" button.

platform_guides.title: Platform Guides
platform_guides.content: Platform guides are a collection of guides that will help you understand how to use the platform. Each important feature has a guide that will help you understand how to use it. For any other information not covered in the guides, you can always contact us at support@videatly.com.
platform_guides.guidesPhrase: In order, you should read the guides as follows:

guides.title: Ideas Guide
guides.description: Learn how to create and manage ideas

guides.title: Scripts Guide
guides.description: Learn how to create and manage scripts

guides.title: Production Guide
guides.description: Learn how to create and manage productions

tokens_plans.title: Tokens & Plans
tokens_plans.content: Each user starts with 7500 tokens total, 5000 for the scripts creation and 2500 for the ideas creation. This amount is enough to create 4 videos and at least 4 scripts. The tokens in each plan are renewed every 30 days. If you run out of tokens, you can buy more in the pricing page.
